about.title: À propos de moi
about.text: Je suis un programmer avec plus de 8 ans d'expérience. J'adore aborder des nouveaux problèmes avec des nouvelles méthodologies. Je vie actuellement à Montréal.

skills.title: Compétences techniques
skills.text: Je maîtrise le Java, l'HTML/le CSS, le JavaScript (frontend et Node), le Python, et le Zig. Bien informé envers le C#, le Golang, et le PowerShell.

experience.title: J'entretiens le Zig Language Server
points: Je développe des outils intellisense qui améliorent les workflows de plus de cinque mille developpeurs Zig.
Je collabore avec une équipe de contributeurs et autres mainteneurs.
Je conçois, programme et déploie une solution de test à données aléatoires pour guarantir une experience sans heurts pour mes utilisateurs.

experience.title: Je conçois et déploie un site pour une conférence Zig
points: Working with Vancouver stakeholders to produce high-quality designs remotely from Montréal.
Adapting designs to an existing Go-based internal solution.
Ensuring full functionality and accessibility.

experience.title: J'ai créé un indexeur Zig pour Sourcegraph (Freelance)
points: Adapted Zig Language Server code to statically index Zig code.
Tested solution on Sourcegraph servers.
Worked with stakeholders to ensure timely delivery, even as a full-time student in Montréal.

experience.title: J'ai dirigé le site satirique The Snitch
points: Wrote, edited, and webmastered for a school satirical journal that I co-founded in Bethesda, Maryland.
Worked with large writing and editing team to keep output continuous and high-quality.
Designed the website and implemented it with a Node backend.

experience.title: J'ai enseigné pour l'OBNL CoderDojo DC
points: Taught 6 - 17 year olds Scratch, Python, and HTML / CSS / JavaScript in Rockville, Maryland.
Helped people with no access to computers at home acquire computer literacy skills.
Configured Rockville Memorial Library Science Center space to optimize teaching.

experience.title: J'ai enseigné pour GeekExpress
points: Taught 5 - 14 year olds twice a week in Beirut throughout the year and full-time in July 2018.
Developed curriculums around app, web, and XR development.
Helped expand company to local schools.

experience.title: J'ai implementé un backend cryptographique chez CryptoPHI
points: Worked in Beirut once a week throughout the year, full-time in June 2018 on backend code and infrastructure.
Collaborated with cryptography PhD on secure storage implementation.
Translated PHP components of the old backend into Node.

experience.title: J'ai prototypé un circuit chez Innovo
points: Created a circuit prototype with minimal guidance in Beirut.
Transformed the prototype into a PCB using EAGLE, a CNC machine, and a healthy dose of soldering.
Thoroughly tested PCB to ensure full functionality was delivered.
